thread.title: Drake & OG Ron C Collaborating For "More Chops" & Next "Fuck Action" Mixtape
thread.title_full: Drake & OG Ron C Collaborating For "More Chops" & Next "Fuck Action" Mixtape

author: Ural Garrett
title: Drake & OG Ron C Collaborating For "More Chops" & Next "Fuck Action" Mixtape
text:
A post shared by OVOG RON C (@ogronc) on Mar 20, 2017 at 8:06am PDT 0 
Nothing represents Drake’s love for Houston more than his collaborations with OG Ron C and The Chopstars. The chopped not slopped versions of Drizzy’s albums have led to Houston Can Thank Us Later, Chop Care, Choppin Ain’t The Same, If You’re Choppin This It’s Too Late and Codeine Views. 
As More Life is set to shatter records left and right since its debut last weekend, the two are slated to release a chopped and screwed version through More Chops . 
That’s not the only project their working on together. 
Drake is also reportedly helping OG Ron C with the next entry in his Fuck Action series, which has historically featured R&B songs getting the H-Town treatment. Titled Fuck Action 69, expect the playlist this summer. 
So far, More Life has racked up more than 76 million total streams and is predicted to do 500,000 to 550,000 with sales plus streaming to land at the #1 spot on the Billboard 200, according to previous reports.
